name: Breaking Bad S2
description: Walter White, a struggling high school chemistry teacher, is diagnosed with advanced lung cancer.

name: Mr. Robot S1
description: The show follows Elliot, who is a cyber-security tech by day and vigilante hacker by night.

name: Fight Club
description: A ticking-time-bomb insomniac and a slippery soap salesman channel primal male aggression into a shocking new form of therapy.

name: Dexter S4
description: He's Dexter Morgan, everyone's favorite serial killer. As a Miami forensics expert, he spends his days solving crimes, and nights committing them.

name: True Detective S1
description: An anthology series in which police investigations unearth the personal and professional secrets of those involved, both within and outside the law.
